text: We e kebꞌ qꞌalajisal taq tzij riꞌ kayaꞌtaj na bꞌe chike kakitanabꞌa ri jabꞌ oxibꞌ junabꞌ rukꞌ nikꞌaj, are waꞌ ri qꞌotaj ri kakibꞌan ri qꞌalajisanik cho ri uwachulew. Xuqujeꞌ yaꞌtal bꞌe chike chi kakikikꞌarisaj ri jaꞌ rech jeriꞌ ronojel uwach kꞌaxkꞌolal, kakibꞌan che ri uwachulew janipa mul kakaj aꞌreꞌ.
